# Simple Music Player

This project features a simple music player designed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The music player allows users to play and control audio tracks, displaying the song title, artist, and progress bar.

## Project Completion Date

This project was completed on January 8, 2023.

## Usage

To use the music player:
1. Clone the repository or download the HTML, CSS, and MP3 files.
2. Open the `index.html` file in a web browser.
3. Click the play button to start the music.
4. Use the progress bar to skip to different parts of the song.
5. Click the pause button to pause the music.

## Features

- Simple and intuitive interface for playing audio tracks.
- Displays the song title and artist information.
- Includes play, pause, and skip controls for easy navigation.
- Dynamic progress bar to visualize the current position of the song.

## File Structure

- `index.html`: HTML file containing the structure of the music player interface and also contain inline JavaScript which provide the logic to control the music player and update the progress bar.
- `style.css`: CSS file containing styles for the music player interface.
- `externals/`: Folder containing MP3 files for the audio tracks.
